title: Accum. function f: f(7), f'(7), opt., L'Hosp.

frqParts.text: (b) Find the value of x in the closed interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>[</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mtext> 3</mtext> </mrow> <mo>]</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaamWaaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiabgkHiTiaaisdacaGGSaGaaeiiaiaabodaa8aacaGL BbGaayzxaaaaaa@3BCB@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> at which f attains its maximum value. Justify your answer.

(c) For each of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <msup> <mn>0</mn> <mo>−</mo> </msup> </mrow> </munder> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mi>g</mi> <mo>'</mo> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaci GGSbGaaiyAaiaac2gaaSqaaiaadIhacqGHsgIRcaaIWaWaaWbaaWqa beaacqGHsislaaaaleqaaOGaaeiiaiaadEgadaahaaWcbeqaaiaacE caaaGccaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcaaaa@429A@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <msup> <mn>0</mn> <mo>+</mo> </msup> </mrow> </munder> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mi>g</mi> <mo>'</mo> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaci GGSbGaaiyAaiaac2gaaSqaaiaadIhacqGHsgIRcaaIWaWaaWbaaWqa beaacqGHRaWkaaaaleqaaOGaaeiiaiaadEgadaahaaWcbeqaaiaacE caaaGccaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcaaaa@428F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, find the value or state that it does not exist.

topic.text: 1.5: Determining Limits Using Algebraic Properties of Limits
